          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_fac5dd0e006e8f036c92c1c0158b5631b7c49906</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Transforming the energy from the sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umwandeln der Energie von der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transformation de l'énergie du soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformando a energia do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasformazione dell'energia proveniente dal sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετασχηματισμός της ενέργειας από τον ήλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transformar la energía del sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how plants and solar panels transform the energy from the Sun into other forms of storable energy.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rechargeable battery</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar panel</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Betriebe und 
Solarpanels die Energie von der Sonne in andere Formulare der 
speicherbaren Energie umwandeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les usines et 
les panneaux solaires transforment l'énergie du soleil en d'autres 
formes d'énergie entreposable.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como as plantas e os 
painéis solares transformam a energia do sol em outros formulários 
da energia storable.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come le piante ed i 
pannelli solari trasformano l'energia proveniente dal sole in altre 
forme di energia conservabile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς οι εγκαταστάσεις 
και οι ηλιακές επιτροπές μετασχηματίζουν την ενέργεια από τον 
ήλιο σε άλλες μορφές της storable ενέργειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo las plantas y los
paneles solares transforman la energía del sol en otras formas de 
energía almacenable.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nachladbare Batterie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarpanel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">usines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">batterie rechargeable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie solaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">panneau solaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
